# Server Rules This is a Wizard's Den server, one of the official Space Station 14 servers. A ban in this server is a ban from all Wizard's Den servers.
[color=#ff0000]Only Core Rules apply on this server.[/color] MRP Amendments do NOT apply.
## Core Rules These rules apply at all times, including between rounds unless otherwise specified.
- [textlink="1. Listen to admins and report issues" link="RuleC1"] - [textlink="2. No toxicity" link="RuleC2"] - [textlink="3. No discrimination" link="RuleC3"] - [textlink="4. No sexual or shock content" link="RuleC4"] - [textlink="5. No communication beyond In-Character methods" link="RuleC5"] - [textlink="6. No ban discussion or evasion" link="RuleC6"] - [textlink="7. Only use English" link="RuleC7"] - [textlink="8. No exploits or cheats" link="RuleC8"] - [textlink="9. No shared or multiple accounts" link="RuleC9"] - [textlink="10. Players must be at least 16 years old and act mature" link="RuleC10"]
## Additional Information - Ban appeals https://forum.spacestation14.com/c/ban-appeals/appeals-game/40 - Ban policy https://docs.spacestation14.com/en/community/admin/wizards-den-banning-policy.html - Admin policy https://docs.spacestation14.com/en/community/admin/wizards-den-admin-policy.html
